Card1.Title:
Change
a Major/Minor Field
Card1.Description: Submit a form requesting changes to your major and/or minor fields of study.
Card1.Features:
DocuSign Features:

  • Single Signer
  • JWT Authentication
  • Fill tab data
  • Import HTML doc
  • Embedded Signing
  • Sign without leaving the website

an Unofficial Transcript
